Header: Aung San Suu Kyi rejects interference by powerful countries
Content: State Council Leader of Myanmar Aung San Suu Kyi says that she rejects interference by the powerful countries in the world in the affairs of countries such as Sri Lanka and Myanmar. She has emphasized that those countries are capable of resolving issues that arise in their countries. She has said this during a discussion with Sri Lanka Ambassador in Myanmar Nandimithra Ekanayaka at her Official Residence. She said that Myanmar would continue to support Sri Lanka in future as well. She said that she hopes to visit Sri Lanka soon.
